SEARCH
Module com.karan.ludofx
Package com.karan.ludofx.model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
com.karan.ludofx.model.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Class for creation of a separation layer between game and GUI, also manages the general turn mechanics. Many methods call gameController methods for changing graphics

    • rollDice

      public void rollDice()
      Checks if player already rolled, otherwise rolls dice. Checks if player has movable tokens with dice rolled, if not calls nextPlayer() If player has one and only movable token, moves automatically.
